A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A week after viewing #2 and the magic has wore off. I am now left with a huge feeling of... disappointment. There were so many chances for TLJ to deliver\, but just when you think you know where the movie is going\, plot twist! The first time this happens\, you are intrigued\, but after two and a half hours of these undelivered resolutions\, even on one single storyline\, you'll feel mentally and emotionally exhausted. There is nothing clever or original about what RJ and KK have put out as their finished film\, it is just a giant F-U to true fans with its blatant debunking of previously established theories\, yet offering nothing new in lieu of. If there is a theme to be pulled out of the giant cloisterpuck that is TLJ\, its \"NO!\"
